disorder.name: Aichmophobia
disorder.desc: You cannot activate or depart with axes, swords, spears, daggers, scythes, or katars in your gear grid.

disorder.name: Anxiety
disorder.desc: At the start of each showdown, gain the priority target token unless you have stinky gear in your gear grid.

disorder.name: Apathetic
disorder.desc: You cannot use or gain survival. You cannot gain courage. Cure this disorder if you have 8+ understanding.

disorder.name: Binge Eating
disorder.desc: You cannot depart unless you have consumable gear in your gear grid. You must consume if a choice to consume arises.

disorder.name: Coprolalia
disorder.desc: All your gear is noisy. You are always a threat unless you are knocked down, even if an effect says otherwise.

disorder.name: Fear of the Dark
disorder.desc:
You retire.
If you gain this disorder during a hunt or showdown, you put on a brave face until you return to the settlement, vowing never to leave the Lantern Hoard again.

disorder.name: Hemophobia
disorder.desc: During the showdown, whenever a survivor (including you) gains a bleeding token, you are knocked down.

disorder.name: Hoarder
disorder.desc: Whenever you are a returning survivor, archive 1 resource gained from the last showdown and gain +1 courage.

disorder.name: Honorable
disorder.desc: You cannot attack a monster from its blind spot or if it is knocked down.

disorder.name: Hyperactive
disorder.desc: During the showdown, you must move at least 1 space every round.

disorder.name: Immortal
disorder.desc:
While you are insane, convert all damage dealt to your hit locations to brain damage.
You are so busy reveling in your own glory that you cannot spend survival while insane.

disorder.name: Indecision
disorder.desc: If you are the event revealer of hunt events that call on you to make a roll, roll twice and use the lower result.

disorder.name: Monster Panic
disorder.desc: Whenever you suffer brain damage from an Intimidate action, suffer 1 additional brain damage.

disorder.name: Post-Traumatic Stress
disorder.desc: Next settlement phase, you do not contribute or participate in any endeavors. Skip the next hunt to recover.

disorder.name: Prey
disorder.desc: You may not spend survival unless you are insane.

disorder.name: Quixotic
disorder.desc: If you are insane when you depart, gain +1 survival and +1 Strength token.

disorder.name: Rageholic
disorder.desc: Whenever you suffer a severe injury, also suffer the frenzy brain trauma.

disorder.name: Secretive
disorder.desc: When you are a returning survivor, you quickly become preoccuiped with your own affairs. You must skip the next hunt to deal with them.

disorder.name: Seizures
disorder.desc: During the showdown, whenever you suffer damage to your head location, you are knocked down.

disorder.name: Squeamish
disorder.desc: You cannot depart with any stinky gear in your gear grid. If a status or effect would cause you to become stinky, lose all your survival.

disorder.name: Traumatized
disorder.desc: Whenever you end your act adjacent to a monster, you are knocked down.

disorder.name: Vestiphobia
disorder.desc: You cannot wear armor at the body location. If you are wearing armor at the body location when you gain this disorder, archive it as you tear it off your person!

disorder.name: Weak Spot
disorder.desc: When you gain this disorder, roll a random hit location and record it. You cannot depart unless you have armor at this hit location.

fa.name: Ambidexterous
fa.desc: All melee weapons in your gear grid gain paired. Ambidexterous cannot be used if there are any shields, two-handed or heavy gear in your gear grid.

fa.name: Berserker
fa.desc: Once per showdown, you may spend a to suffer bash and the frenzy brain trauma.

fa.name: Clutch Fighter
fa.desc: While you have 3 or more bleeding tokens, gain +1 strength and +1 accuracy.

fa.name: Combo Master
fa.desc: On a perfect hit, make 1 additional attack roll.

fa.name: Crazed
fa.desc: On a Perfect hit, gain +1 insanity.

fa.name: Crossarm Block
fa.desc: Whenever you are hit, after hit locations are rolled, you may change 1 result to the arms hit location.

fa.name: Double Dash
fa.desc: During your act, once per round, you may spend <font class='kdm_font'>a</font> to gain <font class='kdm_font'>c</font>.

fa.name: Extra Sense
fa.desc: You may dodge 1 additional time per round.

fa.name: Last Man Standing
fa.desc: While you are the only survivor on the showdown board, you may not gain bleeding tokens or be knocked down.

fa.name: Leader
fa.desc:
Encourage a survivor, they gain +1 speed token until end of the round.
Once per hunt phase another survivor can use your understanding and courage to resolve.

fa.name: Mighty Strike
fa.desc: On a Perfect hit, gain +2 Strength until the end of the attack.

fa.name: Monster Claw Style
fa.desc: Your Fist & Tooth attacks gain +1 Accuracy, +1 Strength and Savage.

fa.name: Orator of Death
fa.desc:
Once per showdown, you may spend a to have all non-deaf survivors gain +2 insanity.
When you die, you encourage all survivors.

fa.name: Rhythm Chaser
fa.desc:
On Arrival, gain +1 evasion token. When you are knocked down, if you don't have an instrument in your gear grid, remove all your +1 evasion tokens.
Cannot be used with heavy gear.

fa.name: Strategist
fa.desc: During the showdown setup, after placing terrain, you may add a Giant Stone Face or a Toppled Pillar terrain card to the showdown board.

fa.name: Thrill Seeker
fa.desc: Whenever you gain survival during the showdown phase, gain 1 additional survival.

fa.name: Timeless Eye
fa.desc:
Your attack roll is a perfect hit on a result of a 9 or 10.
You cannot use Timeless Eye if you have the blind severe head injury.

fa.name: Tough
fa.desc: When rolling on a severe injury table, unless you roll a 1, add +1 to the result. (This does not include brain trauma. The result total cannot exceed 10.)

fa.name: Tumble
fa.desc: On collide roll 1d10. On a result of 6+, you successfully tumble out of harm's way. Instead, place your survivor standing on the closest free space outside of the collision path.

fa.name: Unconscious Fighter
fa.desc: It takes 7 bleeding tokens to kill you.

sfa.name: Beast of Caratosis
sfa.desc:
You may Concentrate. If you do, perform Beast of Caratosis at the start of your next act.
Beast of Caratosis: Place your survivor adjacent to the monster. For this attack, your attack speed is equal to your red affinities, you hit automatically, and you gain strength equal to double your red affinities. Then, gain +6 Hunt XP.

sfa.name: Bone Whisperer
sfa.desc:
When another survivor dies on the showdown board, place a token where they died. If you pass over it, remove the token and eat their skull. Heal your survivor and roll 1d10 + your Hunt XP:
1-3You feel amazing! Gain +1 permanent movement, speed and evasion.
4-8Gain +1 permanent strength.
9-18You gain a fighting art and +5 survival.
19+You run away into exile. At the end of the showdown, you are gone forever.

sfa.name: Lucernae's Lantern
sfa.desc:
You may Concentrate. If you do, perform Lucernae's Lantern at the start of your next act.
Lucernae's Lantern: You reach into the dream and excise a screeching skull, darker than darkness. It hurtles at the monster.
Reveal hit locations equal to half your blue affinities (rounded down) one at a time. The mosnter suffers a critical wound at any locations with critical wound effects. (Ignore the effects of trap.) Then reshuffle the hit location deck. Gain +6 Hunt XP.

sfa.name: Grace of Dormenatus
sfa.desc:
You may Concentrate. If you do, perform Grace of Dormenatus at the start of your next act.
Grace of Dormenatus: You reach into the dream and remove a twisting green crown. The crown explodes. A glittering rain of shards coats the survivors.
All survivors gain armor at all hit locations equal to your green affinities. They may remove up to the same number of tokens. Them, gain +6 Hunt XP. If you still exist, gain the priority target token.

sfa.name: King's Step
sfa.desc: Whenever you attack, you may discard any number of Battle Pressure hit locations drawn and draw an equal number of new hit locations. Whenever you attack, after drawing hit locations, but before rolling to wound, you may choose one hit location drawn and discard it to draw a new hit location. Traps will cancel these effects.

sfa.name: King of a Thousand Battles
sfa.desc: Gain +2 Accuracy, +2 Strength, +2 Evasion. You may dodge any number of times in a round. Only 1 survivor may have this Secret Fighting Art.

sfa.name: Legendary Lungs
sfa.desc: Once per attack, for each successful hit, make an additional attack roll.

sfa.name: Red Fist
sfa.desc: At the start of each showdown, each survivor gains +1 Strength token. Survivors may spend +1 Strength tokens in place of survival.

sfa.name: Scholar of Death
sfa.desc:
On Arrival, gain reroll tokens equal to the number of volumes recorded about your quarry. (e.g. if your settlement has White Lion Volumes 1, 2, and 3 when you fight a White Lion, gain 3 reroll tokens.)
Discard a reroll token to reroll one of your roll results during the showdown. This includes monster roll results when you are the monster controller.

sfa.name: Swordsman's Promise
sfa.desc: At the start of each showdown, gain survival up to your settlement's survival limit if you have a sword in your gear grid.

sfa.name: Synchronized Strike
sfa.desc:
With flawless coordination, you strike as one. When you're adjacent to a monster, attack with a melee weapon, and have an Attack Assist, your attack gains +1 Accuracy, +1 Strength. Limit, once per round.
Attack Assist: A survivor who also has Synchronized Strike and is in the right spot. They are standing adjacent to the monster, on its opposite side, and parallel to you.

sfa.name: Zero Presence
sfa.desc: Gain +1 Strength when attacking a monster from its blind spot. Whenever you attack a monster, you are always considered to be in its blind spot.
